level.heading: GENERAL DEFINITIONS (§ 1-2899) For the purposes of this Chapter the term: Act means the Office of Administrative Hearings Establishment Act of 2001, D.C.fficial Code §§ 2-1831.01, et seq. Agency shall have the meaning provided that term in D.C. Official Code §-502(3). Civil Infractions Act means the Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairsivil Infractions Act of 1985, D.C. Official Code §§ 2-1801.01, et seq. Clerk means the OAH Clerk of Court or authorized designee. Commercial carrier means a business that accepts and delivers parcels, such asederal Express or the United Parcel Service. Government means the District of Columbia, or any government agency authorizedy law to prosecute cases before OAH and whose administrative litigation fallsnder the jurisdiction of OAH, but does not include OAH. Litter Control Administration Act means the Litter Control Administration Act of985, D.C. Official Code §§ 8-801, et seq. Paper means pleadings, motions, exhibit and witness lists, or any other writtenubmission filed with OAH. Party means persons or entities who begin a case at OAH or the persons orntities on the other side. Presiding Administrative Law Judge means an Administrative Law Judge assigned to particular case.
SOURCE
